text:
Looks like org.apache.jmeter.Driver class has been renamed to 
org.apache.jmeter.NewDriver in the jar file. So when you try to start
it complains that it cannot find it.

This is version 1.6
creator: kandikattu@yahoo.com
jim@boutcher.com
text:
Since we're past 1.6, and I've never seen this (running same platform and OS as
the submitter) - can I assume this is fixed? Srini: Have you done a recent
checkout and still have this problem?

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
